title: Drawing, "Design Detail for Knotted Pile Rug"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Above, close-up view of 1993-121-56 showing one square element within a diamond shape.  Below, more detailed view of individual colored wool threads indicated by mutiple circles.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design Detail for Knotted Pile Rug". Pastel/crayon, graphite on tan paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-57.
